reference_summary:
Bates Motel
Suspense, Horror, Drama
["Emmy-nominated actress Vera Farmiga returns for double duty as executive producer while also reprising her role as 'Mother’ who is very much alive and well but only in the twisted, complicated mind of 'Norman Bates’ played by Freddie Highmore. Grammy Award winner and series super fan Rihanna checks in to play the role of 'Marion Crane,’ putting a newly reimagined spin on the iconic character."]

loved the show and enjoyed every episode for FREE!!  Another attack by "AMAZON DIGITAL SERVICES"  Beware they start with small fee's  1.99,2.99 to check your attention that they do a fast series of 8.99,12,99,14,99 etc.... AMAZON DIGITAL SERVICE>>>>>SCAM>>>>BEWARE>>>>>it may not show up on your bill as anything but a fee....that will grow and grow until you DO SOMETHING!
AMAZON DIGITAL SERVICE  SCAM ALERT!!!!  Look it up and learn and help us stop it now!!

Recent interactions reinforce the user's distrust of digital service practices and their critical stance toward automatic billing and unclear billing processes, marking them as a vigilant consumer in the digital content landscape.
